price: ߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߞߊ߲ߘߦߊ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߞߊ߲߬ ߞߊ߬ ߝߘߴߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߟߊ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ ߣߴߏ߬ ߟߎ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߛߎߘߊ߲ߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ عَلَىٰ هُدٗى مِّن رَّبِّهِمۡۖ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: ulāika ʿalā hudan min rabbihim wa-ulāika humu al-muf'liḥūna
